extendedInfo.description: Friendship plays a huge role in The Kite Runner. The friendship between Amir and Hassan is important to the story. Without that Sohrab would still be Assefâs servant. Their friendship is still important even through the bad times, if their friendship didnât exist Amir wouldnât have gone through his emotional battle which made him overall a great person.Friendship is so key, that I have made a quiz where when you take it, you will find out what your best friend could be, if you were in the story.DISCLAIMER : This application is solely for education purposes and uses some copyrighted material, any take-down requests will endorsed

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Just took the quiz and it seems really accurate. Pretty neat little school assignment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is amazing
reviews.comment: I was working on this app in conjunction with Radiation Studios, This app is great. It was designed for an english assignment. I have put a lot of effort in this app and i like it a lot.
reviews.author: A Google User
